# ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.anyPlane

**Case**

A goal that specifies your app requires a plane of any type.

## Declaration

```swift
case anyPlane
```

## Discussion

When you use this goal, coaching overlay won’t hide until the user has moved their device in a way that facilitates ARKit finding at least one surface. For the available surface types, see [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneClassification].

## Defining a Goal

- **ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.horizontalPlane**: A goal that specifies your app requires a horizontal plane.
- **ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.tracking**: A goal that specifies your app requires basic world tracking.
- **ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.verticalPlane**: A goal that specifies your app requires a vertical plane.
- **ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.geoTracking**: A goal that specifies your app requires a precise geographic location.
